author: iSazonov
body:
From:

This PR has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had activity in the last 30 days. It will be closed if no further activity occurs within 10 days. Thank you for your contributions.

with
```
This PR has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had activity in the last 30 days.
It will be closed if no further activity (new commits/comments) occurs within 10 days.
Thank you for your contributions.

Community members are welcome to grab these works.
```

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body:
should be
> Community members are welcome to

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @iSazonov seems like a good change, I'd suggest submitting as PR

title: Update stale bot message
